resources.string: Please enter your credentials which you can use next time to login.
Please login using your credentials which you had used during registration with the app.
Please enter a password having at least %1$d characters.
Please enter a user Id having at least %1$d characters.
Login failed, please check your credentials.
Please make sure that Google play services are installed and enabled to continue using this app.
Location permissions are required by this app to track you.
Location permissions are required by this app to track you. Please grant them to use this app.
